didn't worker the bios change!: How can I change the booting partition, my current boot partition is windows, wanna change it to grub...!
How can i change to boot partition?

, o reinstall grub to the ubuntu drive , boot into ubuntu live media (cd or usb), find the ubuntu drive designation with sudo fdisk -l , then run: 'sudo grub-install /dev/sdX , X being number assigned to the ubuntu drive/device.
